mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_test(tno, WRITER, title, content) VALUES (seq_test_tno.nextval, 'ADMIN',#{title},#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM rno,tno, writer, title, CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE FROM (SELECt tno, writer, title, CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE FROM TBL_TEST ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) where rownum >0 and rownum <=10
